definition: see 阮[ruan3]
ruan, a four-stringed Chinese lute
surname Ruan/small state during the Shang Dynasty (1600-1046 BC) located in the southeast of modern-day Gansu Province

salted/salty/stingy/miserly

Wei (220-265) and Jin (265-420) dynasties

Lu Ji (261-303), Chinese writer and literary critic
dissipated/unruly

Western Jin dynasty (265-316)
Jin Dynasty (265-420)

Jin Dynasty (265-420)
